content.raw:
A proposal to simplify the Application API is [here](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-gui/branch/gz11_app_nate?dest=gz11_app#diff).

The goal I was trying to achieve is:

1. Reduce the number of entry points. Currently there is an Exec entry point and an Load/Init entry point.
2. Use a Create / Init / Exec series that is a bit more explicit. Currently, a user would have to run “LoadConfig” and “LoadPlugin” before running an “Init” function. The proposal combines the “Load” and “init” so that order does not matter to the user, and they have fewer function to call.

The proposal is still rough.
content.html:
A proposal to simplify the Application API is here.

The goal I was trying to achieve is:

  1. Reduce the number of entry points. Currently there is an Exec entry point and an Load/Init entry point.
  2. Use a Create / Init / Exec series that is a bit more explicit. Currently, a user would have to run “LoadConfig” and “LoadPlugin” before running an “Init” function. The proposal combines the “Load” and “init” so that order does not matter to the user, and they have fewer function to call.

The proposal is still rough.
